summary: This document outlines corporate resolutions for TerraMar Project Inc. regarding the establishment and management of accounts with UBS Financial Services Inc. It details the authority granted to corporate officers and authorized representatives to act on behalf of the corporation in financial matters, including the opening of accounts, executing transactions, and handling tax-related documents.

persons.name: Emilio
persons.context: Emilio is identified as the Secretary of TerraMar Project Inc. and certifies the resolutions adopted by the Board of Directors.

keyFacts: The document authorizes the establishment of accounts with UBS Financial Services Inc. for various financial transactions.
Corporate officers are granted the authority to act individually on behalf of the corporation without the need for co-signatures.
The resolutions supersede any previous resolutions regarding the accounts with UBS.
The Secretary certifies that the resolutions were adopted in accordance with the corporation's charter and bylaws.
The corporation agrees to indemnify UBS against any claims arising from actions taken under these resolutions.
